about_the_game:
Forest of Deceit is a 4-8 player social deduction game, where you use your phones to play!

From the minds of Ghost Camp comes a treacherous experience about trying to survive a storm without being betrayed by your friends.

With a beautiful hand-drawn art style and a focus on casual play, this Jackbox-esque game is perfect for anyone aged 12 to 112!

Features:

• An endlessly replayable party game, complete with fully customisable game options to create your own "house rules".

• Not enough controllers? No problem! Use your own phones, tablets, or computers for each player to play right from their very own web browser.

• Find other social deduction videogames are a little too complex for your non-gamer friends? Don't worry, this one is focused on being fun for the whole family.

• Works great with screen-sharing for online play - we recommend Discord!

content_descriptors.notes:
The game features text and spoken allusions to murder, but nothing too explicit or graphic.

The worst thing that happens visually is a card getting ripped in half every so often!

It should be fine for most players.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 500+ / Radeon 5000+ or Greater
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yup, you need a sound card.
  • Additional Notes: This game uses web browsers as controllers, so each player will need their own phone, tablet, or PC to play!
